original_text: He also gathered together all the leaders of Israel, as well as the priests and Levites.
korean_text: 이스라엘 모든 방백과 제사장과 레위 사람을 모았더라

sentences.original_text: He also gathered together all the leaders of Israel
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 또한 이스라엘의 모든 지도자들을 모았고

sentences.original_text: as well as the priests and Levites
